member.name: T:Audis.KnowledgeEnricher.Contract.V1.IKnowledgeEnricher
member.summary: Takes some knowledge and adds further knowledge based on existing knowledge.

member.name: M:Audis.KnowledgeEnricher.Contract.V1.IKnowledgeEnricher.EnrichKnowledge(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{Audis.KnowledgeEnricher.Contract.V1.KnowledgeDto}})
member.summary: Takes some knowledge and adds further knowledge based on the existing knowledge. Concrete implementations can inherit specific knowledge based on input knowledge.
member.param: The knowledge used as starting point for inheriting knowledge.
member.returns: Returns the given knowledge plus potentially more inherited knowledge.
